name: windsurf-project
description: A static sci-fi portfolio template with a local-only “mini CMS” editor.

scripts.build:js: terser scripts/main.js -o scripts/main.min.js --compress --mangle && terser scripts/admin.js -o scripts/admin.min.js --compress --mangle && terser scripts/site-config.js -o scripts/site-config.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build:css: cleancss styles/style.css -o styles/style.min.css && cleancss styles/cards.css -o styles/cards.min.css && cleancss styles/admin.css -o styles/admin.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css
